i1.name: Demon Shade
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Evelynn''' gains ''Demon Shade'' after not performing actions that [[Stealth#Breaking_stealth|break stealth]] for 4 seconds. Taking damage from enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} or {{tip|turret|turrets}} ends ''Demon Shade'' immediately and puts it on a {{fd|1.5}} second {{tt|static cooldown|unaffected by cooldown reduction}}.

{{sbc|Demon Shade:}} While below {{as|{{sti|health|{{passive progression/deprecated version|250 to 590}} {{as|(+ 250% AP)}} health}}}}, '''Evelynn''' {{tip|heal|heals}} herself for {{passive progression/deprecated version|15 to 75}} every second. From [[Experience (champion)|level]] 6 onward, ''Demon Shade'' also grants {{tip|camouflage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Evelynn gains Demon Shade after not performing actions that Stealth#Breaking_stealth for 4 seconds. Taking damage from enemy champions or turrets ends Demon Shade immediately and puts it on a 1.5 second static cooldown.Demon Shade: While below Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 250 to 590 (+ 250% AP) health, Evelynn heals herself for Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 15 to 75 every second. From Experience (champion) 6 onward, Demon Shade also grants camouflage.
i1.notes:
* ''Demon Shade'' is also placed on a {{fd|1.5}} second cooldown upon [[death|respawning]].
* ''Demon Shade'' activates even if '''Evelynn''' is {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.
* Whenever ''Demon Shade'' activates, a puff of purple smoke will briefly appear around her.
[[File:Evelynn_Spotted.png|thumb|left|'''Evelynn''' being {{tip|sight|revealed}} in ''Demon Shade'' ''(post 6)''.]]

q1.name: Hate Spike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' launches a dart in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit.
For the next 4 seconds, the enemy hit takes {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} from her next 3 [[basic attack]]s and abilities.
''Hate Spike'' may be re-cast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Evelynn''' unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck. ''Hate Spike'' will first prioritize '''Evelynn's''' attack target, then the nearest enemy champion.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit.For the next 4 seconds, the enemy hit takes bonus magic damage from her next 3 basic attacks and abilities.Hate Spike may be re-cast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Hate Spike will first prioritize Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest enemy champion.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|10*3 to 50*3}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
{{st|Spike Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|25*3 to 45*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|25*4+10*3 to 45*4+50*3}} {{as|(+ 195% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Hate Spike'' prioritizes:
*# The last champion '''Evelynn''' hit
*# The last non-champion '''Evelynn''' hit
*# The lowest-health champion
*# The lowest-health non-champion
* The dart applies {{tip|spell damage}} and the spikes deal {{tip|area damage}}.
* ''Hate Spike'' is always cast from the original casting position.
* Recasts can be buffered up to {{fd|0.5}} seconds before becoming castable.
* ''Hate Spike'' cannot be recast without a valid target nearby.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|4|Starts on-cast}}' as '4' and riot's value '0,0,0,0,0' as '0'

w1.name: Allure
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' ''curses'' the target enemy {{tip|champion}} or {{tip|monster}} for 5 seconds.
'''Evelynn's''' next [[basic attack]] or [[champion ability|ability]] against the ''accursed'' target ''expunges'' them, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 65% for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

''Expunging'' a target will refund ''Allure's'' {{as|{{sti|mana|mana cost}}}}. If the target is ''cursed'' for at least {{fd|2.5}} seconds '''Evelynn''' also {{tip|charm|charms}} them for a few seconds and the {{tip|slow}} is increased to last for the same duration, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.

Against champions, the ''expunge'' also {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|reduces their magic resistance}}}} for 4 seconds.
Against monsters, the ''expunge'' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and the {{tip|charm}} lasts 2 seconds longer.
''Casting Allure does not break {{ai|Demon Shade|Evelynn}} nor its fade into it.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Evelynn curses the target enemy champion or monster for 5 seconds.Evelynn's next basic attack or champion ability against the accursed target expunges them, slowing them by 65% for 0.75 seconds.Expunging a target will refund Allure's mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds Evelynn also charms them for a few seconds and the slow is increased to last for the same duration, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.Against champions, the expunge also reduces their magic resistance for 4 seconds.
Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the charm lasts 2 seconds longer.Casting Allure does not break Demon Shade nor its fade into it.
leveling: {{st|Magic Resistance Reduction|{{as|{{ap|25 to 35}}%|magic resistance}}}}{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|250 to 450}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* The mark fully forming signifies the {{fd|2.5}} seconds have elapsed, meaning the {{tip|charm}} will be applied on the triggering attack or ability.
** An enemy champion cursed by ''Allure'' is alarmed of her presence and after the mark has fully formed, an arrow will appear next to them pointing towards '''Evelynn's''' direction. This is visible to both teams.
* The {{stil|magic penetration}} will be applied to the attack or ability that triggers it.
* ''Allure's'' mark application on a target cannot be blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
** The expunge will not occur if the ability is blocked by a spell shield. The mark does not trigger and will remain on the target in this case.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|15 to 11}}|Starts after the mark ends}}' as '15/14/13/12/11' and riot's value '0,0,0,0,0' as '0'

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Resistance Reduction|{{as|{{ap|25 to 35}}%|magic resistance}}}}{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|250 to 450}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
effects.str:
• Magic Resistance Reduction: %
  • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 60% AP)

r1.name: Last Caress
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} as she reveals her true form to all enemies in front of her in the target direction, before {{tip|blink|blinking}} 700 units in the opposite direction and becoming targetable again.
Enemies caught in her reveal are devastated, taking {{as|magic damage}}, with enemies below {{as|{{sti|health|30% of their '''maximum''' health}}}} receiving {{ccs|140% '''bonus''' damage|magic}}.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Evelynn becomes untargetable as she reveals her true form to all enemies in front of her in the target direction, before blinking 700 units in the opposite direction and becoming targetable again.Enemies caught in her reveal are devastated, taking magic damage, with enemies below 30% of their maximum health receiving Unknown value: ccs 140% bonus damage magic.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125 to 375}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}|Empowered Damage|{{ap|125*2.4 to 375*2.4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*2.4}}% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Last Caress'' can be buffered during {{ai|Empowered Whiplash|Evelynn}}.
* The casting input controls the direction ''Last Caress' '' damage is dealt from, with the movement automatically happening in the reverse direction.
* Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} below the {{as|maximum health}} threshold are {{Color|pink|'''marked'''}} for '''Evelynn''', indicating the bonus damage opportunity.
* The screen will direct to '''Evelynn's''' position after she {{tip|blink|blinks}}.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125 to 375}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}|Empowered Damage|{{ap|125*2.4 to 375*2.4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*2.4}}% AP)}}}}
effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 75% AP)
  • Empowered Damage: (+ % AP)
